description:
A third-year student at Sokai High School. He joined the GUNPLA club after yielding to http://anidb.net/ch119242 [Sana]`s forceful persuasion, but his talent for GUNPLA Battles quickly blossomed thanks to his friendly rivalry with http://anidb.net/ch119238 [Touma] and special training with his senior Rindo. Ryuusei was honored with the high school Triple Crown in individual competition.
Source: gundam.info
name: Fudou Ryuusei
